title: Im trying to submit a ticket but its not working
body: So I just had a 3 man pre-made purposely troll my game, I took pictures of the proof but when i try to drag and drop the file into the attachment box, nothing happens, the files arent being transferred to the box and I cant report them without the proof of the chat box that the guy was gonna troll and he didnt care because hes "better than me" and he has already 3 perma banned accounts. So i really need to submit these photos but its not working.

replies.body: Instead of drag-dropping try just left clicking on the box. It should open up a file explorer where you can add those screenshots. If that still doesn't work out for some weird reason, you can always take a screenshot using something like Gyazo to paste the image URL.
